conditions.name: Condition 1
conditions.label: Condition 1
conditions.description: Confirm inclusion and exclusion criteria before randomization and administration of first dose of study intervention.
conditions.text: Confirm inclusion and exclusion criteria before randomization and administration of first dose of study intervention.

conditions.name: Condition 2
conditions.label: Condition 2
conditions.description: Includes ethnicity (where permissible), year of birth, sex assigned at birth and race.
conditions.text: Includes ethnicity (where permissible), year of birth, sex assigned at birth and race.

conditions.name: Condition 3
conditions.label: Condition 3
conditions.description: Includes pulse rate, blood pressure, respiratory rate, and temperature. Measured after participant has been sitting at least 5 minutes.
conditions.text: Includes pulse rate, blood pressure, respiratory rate, and temperature. Measured after participant has been sitting at least 5 minutes.

conditions.name: Condition 4
conditions.label: Condition 4
conditions.description: Sample one hour before drug intake.
conditions.text: Sample one hour before drug intake.

conditions.name: Condition 5
conditions.label: Condition 5
conditions.description: Sample twice after drug intake at given frequency.
conditions.text: Sample twice after drug intake at given frequency.

conditions.name: Condition 6
conditions.label: Condition 6
conditions.description: This is a fasting visit - participant must fast for at least 8 hours prior to the visit.
conditions.text: This is a fasting visit - participant must fast for at least 8 hours prior to the visit.
